p: Travelers to South Asia, South-East Asia, and the Far East should be vaccinated if they plan to spend a month of longer in a JE-endemic area during the transmission period [ 40]. There are no data on the efficacy of JE vaccination in significantly immunosuppressed patients; however, the vaccine is inactivated and can therefore be given safely. Patients should be warned of the possibility of reduced effectiveness and encouraged to follow mosquito bite avoidance measures [ 25].
